dmca.title: New York Times Out to Get Bloggers
dmca.body:
The New York Times Company
Legal Department
[private]
New York, NY 10036 
tel [private]
fax [private]
[private]
[private]
Vice President and General Counsel 

September 18, 2006 

Via fax and email: [private]/[private]
Google, Inc. 
Attn: Google Legal Support, 
DMCA Complaints 
[private] 
Mountain View, CA 94043 
Re: DMCA Takedown Notice - 
Use of New York Times Articles by http://donkeyod.blogspot.comI 


Dear Sir or Madam 

I am with the Legal Department of The New York Times Company, which publishes The New York Times newspaper, the websites www.nytimes.com and is the owner of the trademark 'The New York Times" (registration number 227,904). 

We recently learned of the existence of http://donkeyod.blogspot.com/, a website owned by Google. This website is publishing on a regular basis numerous articles from www.nytimes.com (see attached list of New York Times articles taken from links on http://donkeyod.blogspot.com/). All these New York Times articles can be found on www.nytimes.com. 

This letter serves as The New York Times's notification to you under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act that the http://donkeyod.blospot.com/ site is infringing our copyrights as described above. 

I have a good faith belief that use of copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

On behalf of The New York Times, I hereby request that Google immediately disable and take down the infringing materials. THIS IS A DMCA TAKE DOWN NOTICE. 

Thank you in advance for your attention to this matter. 

Sincerely, 
[signed]
[private]


The Kafka Strategy By BOB HERBERT 
September 18, 2006 
http://donkeyod.blogspot.com/

King of Pain By PAUL KRUGMAN 
September 18, 2006 
http://donkeyod.blogspot.com/

'Save My Wife' 
September 17, 2006 
Op-Ed Columnist 
By NICHOLAS D. KRISTOF 
http://donkeyod.blogspot.com/ 

The Longer the War, the Larger the Lies 
September 17, 2006 
Op-Ed Columnist 
By FRANK RICH 
http://donkeyod.blogspot.com/

Dying Mothers in Cameroon 
September 14,2006,8:18 pm 
Nicholas D. Kristof 
http://donkeyod.blogspot.com/

Awake and Scream 
September 16, 2006 
Op-Ed Columnist 
By MAUREEN DOWD 
http://donkeyod.blogspot.com/
